price: Sε moanya (anaasε moanto) obiara wͻ efie hͻ a monhwε na moanwura hͻ, kͻpem sε yεbεma mo kwan (ansa). Sε yεka kyerε mo sε: “Monsan mo akyi a, monsan mo akyi”. Ɛno mmom na εyε kronkron ma mo. Nyankopͻn deε Onim dwuma a modie nyinaa.
arabic: فَإِن لَّمۡ تَجِدُواْ فِيهَآ أَحَدٗا فَلَا تَدۡخُلُوهَا حَتَّىٰ يُؤۡذَنَ لَكُمۡۖ وَإِن قِيلَ لَكُمُ ٱرۡجِعُواْ فَٱرۡجِعُواْۖ هُوَ أَزۡكَىٰ لَكُمۡۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِمَا تَعۡمَلُونَ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fa-in lam tajidū fīhā aḥadan falā tadkhulūhā ḥattā yu'dhana lakum wa-in qīla lakumu ir'jiʿū fa-ir'jiʿū huwa azkā lakum wal-lahu bimā taʿmalūna ʿalīmun
